events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I am unhappy with the purchase.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back due to dissatisfaction with the product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to address the refund request related to the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you would like to request a refund for your jacket. I'd be happy to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for your refund request so that I can process it efficiently?
Thank you for your reply. My order number is 123456789, and the jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size. I would like a full refund please.
We have reviewed your order and can confirm eligibility for a full refund. Please return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate that you will send a prepaid label for returning the jacket.
The refund has been processed successfully once we received the returned jacket. You should see the money back on your payment method within 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
As you confirmed receipt of the refund and no further issues were reported, we are now closing this support case.
